summary: Mod that adds armor and weapons for the true Listener.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new standalone set of armor to the game and matching weapons to the set. Currently only for male characters. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />RECOMMENDATIONS:
<br /><br />I recommend you to use this with mod called nightingale with a face.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />RECUIREMENTS:
<br /><br />This mod is completely standalone and doesn´t require anything.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Credits:
<br /><br />To vatakc for making original mesh for the torso
author: vatakc with skyrimgamer000
